info.title: Trevnor Travel Marketplace API
info.description:
Comprehensive API for the Trevnor Travel Marketplace platform. This API allows users to browse travel listings, make bookings, leave reviews, and manage their travel experiences.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Register or login to get a token, then include it in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your-token>
```

## User Roles
- **CUSTOMER**: Can browse listings, make bookings, and leave reviews
- **VENDOR**: Can create and manage travel listings
- **ADMIN**: Full access including user and content moderation

tripDates.description: Predefined trip dates for this listing

UpdateListingRequest.description: All fields are optional for partial updates

tripDateId.description: ID of the predefined trip date, if applicable

subtotal.description: Base price (guests x nights x price)

paymentId.description: External payment ID (e.g. Stripe payment intent ID)

UpdateReviewRequest.description: All fields are optional for partial updates

rating.description: Rating as string, parsed to integer (1-5)

amount.description: Amount in major currency units (e.g. dollars). If null, uses booking total.
Amount in major units. If null, full refund.

400.description: Invalid email format or password too short

409.description: User with this email already exists

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users. Requires ADMIN role.
Public endpoint to search and filter travel listings

200.description: Paginated list of listings matching filters

403.description: Forbidden - VENDOR or ADMIN role required

get.description: Public endpoint to get listing details including trip dates

put.description: Only listing owner or ADMIN can update. All fields are optional for partial updates.

delete.description: Only listing owner or ADMIN can delete

get.description: Returns a paginated list of listings owned by the authenticated vendor.

post.description: Checks whether the listing is available for the given dates/guests and returns a price breakdown if available.

200.description: Availability check result with price calculation when available

post.description: Creates a booking after verifying availability and calculating the price. The total price is computed server-side based on listing price, number of guests, number of nights, taxes (10%), and service fee (5%).

400.description: Booking not available or invalid request

get.description: Returns a paginated list of bookings for the currently authenticated user, ordered by creation date descending.
Returns booking details. Customers can only access their own bookings; ADMIN and VENDOR roles can access any booking.

403.description: Forbidden - booking belongs to another user

delete.description: Cancels a booking owned by the authenticated user. Sets the booking status to CANCELLED. Returns 404 if the booking doesn't exist or doesn't belong to the user.

404.description: Booking not found or not owned by user

put.description: Updates the status of a booking. Only ADMIN and VENDOR roles are authorized.

403.description: Forbidden - ADMIN or VENDOR role required

put.description: Updates the payment status and optionally the payment ID of a booking.

get.description: Public endpoint returning paginated reviews for a specific listing.
Returns a paginated list of reviews written by the authenticated user.

put.description: Only the review author can update their review. All fields are optional.

delete.description: Only the review author or ADMIN can delete a review.

403.description: Forbidden - not the review author or admin

put.description: Marks a review as approved. Only ADMIN role is authorized.

post.description: Creates a Stripe payment intent for a booking. The amount is converted to cents. If amount is not provided, the booking total is used.

403.description: Forbidden - booking does not belong to user

get.description: Retrieves the current status of a Stripe payment intent. Only the booking owner can access it.

403.description: Forbidden - booking does not belong to user

post.description: Processes a refund for a booking. Only the booking owner or ADMIN can request a refund. If amount is null, a full refund is issued.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to refund this booking

get.description: Public endpoint to serve uploaded image files. Only listings, users, and general subdirectories are allowed.

post.description: Upload one or more images for a listing. Only the listing owner or ADMIN can upload. Accepts multipart/form-data.

400.description: No image files provided or validation failed

get.description: Returns a list of image URLs for a listing.

delete.description: Deletes an image from a listing. Only the listing owner or ADMIN can delete. Pass the image URL as a query parameter.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the image to delete

post.description: Upload a profile image for the authenticated user. Accepts multipart/form-data with a single image file.

400.description: No image file provided or validation failed

post.description: Receives and processes Stripe webhook events. Validates the Stripe-Signature header. Handles payment_intent.succeeded (marks booking as PAID and CONFIRMED), payment_intent.payment_failed, and charge.refunded events.
Populates the database with sample data including test users, listings, and trip dates. Useful for development and testing.

get.description: Returns information about available test users and sample listings that can be seeded.
